Title: Betrayal of the Brotherhood
Description:
I should have known. I lost control of the Brotherhood the moment those pardons were offered. Anyone with principle is long gone. 

It's only the brutes left, now. And Duncon Ratsbon was always the biggest brute of them all.

Let's get out of here, $n. If any of these fools try to get in our way, let's teach them a lesson about standing in the path of a VanCleef.
